title: Change center editor width
fullWidth: Please disable full width mode in setting before using this plugin.
disableOnMobile: The plugin functionality has been disabled on mobile devices.

width.title: Set width
width.description: Change center editor width in percentage.

mode.title: Plugin Mode (Effective after Restart)
mode.description:
Simple Mode: Only enables CSS mode, low overhead but does not work with iframes.
Advanced Mode: Simultaneously enables JavaScript monitoring of the editor, high overhead but works with iframes.

miniWindowWidth.title: Mini window width
miniWindowWidth.description: The width of the independent mini window opened in SiYuan, default 94%

widthMode.title: Editor Width Setting Mode
widthMode.description: Set the unit of editor width: percentage or px

minPadding.title: Minimum Padding (px)
minPadding.description: Limit the minimum value of the editor's side padding to prevent the width setting from being too large and blocking the block icon button, default to 16px

offset.title: Editor Offset
offset.description: Adjust the horizontal offset of the editor, with a default of 0px. Positive values shift the editor to the right, while negative values shift it to the left. Acceptable CSS units include 10px, 1em, 1rem, 10%, etc.
